OOC: I want to thank you both for not assuming that you met until I
brought you together. I really appreciated that. :)

> <OLD>
>
> Using his sense of smell, Tucson follows his comrades scent and follows
> that down into the cave that was still in tact. He transforms into robot
> mode and cautiously makes his way down.
>
> " I'm inside Lord Elder.  I can smell him.  He's a bit of a ways down, but
> I know I will find him.   And I sense humans, their scent is all around,
> yet I see no evidence of their presence.  But so help me Primus, if they
> have hurt him or any other innocent Maximal or creature, I will serve them
> their consequences.  And they will have to serve them for as long as they
> live."
>
> He narrows his eyes.
>
> " Perhaps if forced to defend what they have tried to destroy, they will
> think twice about laying harm on anything on this planet.  Their guilt may
> just get the better of them."

<NEW>

LORD ELDER responded, "Humans down there?" ELDER was clearly curious
as well. "I would like a complete report when you return to the Ark,"
He said as he continued to monitor the communications.

> Before lashing out with a roar, he looks around with a snarl on his muzzle.
>
> " I may not be seeing you but I can smell you.  You are neither Maximal or
> Predacon.  You are human.  And not the kind that belongs here...   As Guardian
> of Old Earth, I COMMAND YOU TO SHOW YOURSELVES!"

> <OLD>
>
> Perceptor conitued leading the group out that place, while Windlord was glad
> that he was in the Party

<NEW>

There is no response from any human or proto-human, in fact while
there was definitly the smell of them in the area, the smell is
fading. In other words, they were in deed here at one point, they
appear to have left the area.

However TUCSON's bellow can be heard by PERCEPTOR as he burrowed
through the intervening rock, leading the other MAXIMALS safely out of
the trap they had fallen in to. Also the digging could be heard by
TUCSON's keen hearing.

It was only a few moments before both groups were uited at the front
of the cave opening as PERCEPTOR's digging finally brought NIGHTSHIFT
and WINDLORD out.

(TAG)

- Preston
